name: Faerie Trap
description: Places a faerie trap at your feet which explodes when an enemy approaches it dealing 57-77 + 67% Weapon Damage as Nature Damage. Lines all enemies damaged with Faerie Fire, increasing their chance to be Critical Hit by 8% and preventing them from entering Stealth for 30 seconds. Additionally a Barrier is applied to you for each enemy damaged. Trap will exist for 60 seconds.
